# The Almond Yield Equation from Lobell et al. 2006

$$
Y = -0.015T_{n,2} - 0.0046T^{2}_{n,2} - 0.07P_{1} + 0.0043P^{2}_{1} + 0.28
$$

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

clim_data <- read_delim(file = "clim.txt", delim = " ")
```
